name: Sladical!
description:
I started making this for the 32 Bit Holiday Jam 2021 (PS1 style graphics), but wound up not having time to work on it, so.... Here we go! Still putting it up, I think for what it is it's kinda fun to just slide with.

Controls:
R is reset (There is only 1 level right now)
W/S will provide minimum forward and back momentum
A/D steer very loosely left and right
